properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input field containing the file data to be processed

properties.name: destinationKey
properties.description: The name of the output field that will contain the extracted data

properties.name: options
properties.description: Specify the encoding of the file, defaults to UTF-8

options.name: encoding
options.description: Specify the encoding of the file, defaults to UTF-8

options.name: stripBOM
options.description: Whether to strip the BOM (Byte Order Mark) from the file, this could help in an environment where the presence of the BOM is causing issues or inconsistencies

options.name: keepSource
options.description: Include JSON data of the input item

options.name: JSON
options.description: Include JSON data of the input item

options.name: Binary
options.description: Include binary data of the input item

options.name: Both
options.description: Include both JSON and binary data of the input item

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to join the text from all pages or return an array of text from each page

options.name: joinPages
options.description: Whether to join the text from all pages or return an array of text from each page

options.name: keepSource
options.description: Include JSON data of the input item

options.description: Include JSON data of the input item

options.name: Binary
options.description: Include binary data of the input item

options.name: Both
options.description: Include both JSON and binary data of the input item

options.name: maxPages
options.description: Maximum number of pages to include

options.name: password
options.description: Prowide password, if the PDF is encrypted

hints.text: The name of the input field containing the file data to be processed

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
